headline: Assessing Steel Dynamics (STLD) Valuation After Strong Multi‑Period Share Price Momentum
summary: Steel Dynamics (STLD) has caught investor attention after recent price moves, with the shares posting mixed short term returns but a stronger showing over the month and the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Steel Dynamics. Despite a recent 3.9% one day share price decline and a 5.3% 7 day share price pullback to US$191.68, Steel Dynamics still sits on a 12.2% 30 day and 23.3% 90 day share price return, alongside a 43.2% one year total shareholder return and 5 year total shareholder...
